item.title: Usa #1
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Frell:

MUST I RESTATE THE REASON WE HAVE THE BIGGEST WAR FUNDING?

oh oh I know, is it because if the military doesn’t spend the money that it doesn’t need, they won’t get the funding for when they REALLY need it?

Frell:

The military budget is tied into the private corporations so well thats it probably the best way for the government to get money into the economy.

if the military budget goes into private corporations and those corporations aren’t being heavily taxed then the money doesn’t go back into the economy it goes to those private corporations

scratch that I went full retard for a minute

something to consider however, the only money going back into the economy from private corporations is from minuscule worker pay, and considering the very large private prison industrial complex is a big part of the labour force, very little of that money goes back into the economy indeed

Read full topic

item.title: Usa #1
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Too bad, our government sucks at creating jobs so the funding wont help. Actually doing absolutely nothing creates the most jobs. The military budget is tied into the private corporations so well thats it probably the best way for the government to get money into the economy.

And its not just for murder, it isn’t all guns. Tires for humvees, the humvee parts, boots, uniforms, computers, jets, planes, ships, boats, helicopters, etc. And not all of it is simply for foreign issues, a hunk of it goes to the coast guard, who are the go-to people for offshore rescues.

What the budget produces isn’t the problem. Its the people in charge of what to use it for.

Read full topic

item.title: Usa #1
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:20, topic:449199”][quote author=Bowser jr link=topic=552096.msg4047256#msg4047256 date=1342187544]

MUST I RESTATE THE REASON WE HAVE THE BIGGEST WAR FUNDING?

PROBABLY BECAUSE, UNLIKE OTHER COUNTRIES, OUR FEDERAL GOVERNMENT DOES NOT DO EVERYTHING, WE HAVE STATE GOVERNMENTS FOR LOCAL STUFF

THE CONSTITUTION SAYS THE FEDERAL GOVERNMENT SHOULD ONLY DO 4 THINGS, AND 1/4 OF THE BUDGET IS IN DEFENSE, SO IT IS CORRECT.

What a fine way to set up a budget. Give every task the same amount of money. Other countries tend to look at what is needed. If you were Nazi-Germany in a middle of a war, that would be OK. But you are technical in peace-time. There is no threat to American soil and you don’t need to spend as much on military than the rest of the world does.
[/quote]

The military budget sustains TONS of jobs and technical innovations, not just pew pew machines[/quote]

That money can be used to create jobs that don’t involve murder.

Read full topic
